titleInfo.title: Measuring Syntactic Priming in Dialog Corpora

subject.topic: both for context-free production rules and for Combinatory Categorial Grammar categories. It is stronger for task-oriented dialogs
and stronger in lexical categories than in syntactic categories.
distribution-based measure of priming between linguistic categories. Priming is found in tree banks of dialog corpora

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the Conference on Linguistic Evidence. Empirical, theoretical and computational perspectives
